title: Jesus, Keep Me Near The Cross
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: Jesus, keep me near the cross,
Free to all— a healing stream,
v2: Near the cross, a trembling soul,
There the Bright and Morning Star
v3: Near the cross! O Lamb of God,
Help me walk from day to day,
v4: Near the cross I'll watch and wait,
Till I see my Savior's face,
c1: In the cross, in the cross,
From the cross my ransomed soul
